Auckland GP Judith Gill struck off after claiming $420k for backpackers who had left NZ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/auckland-gp-judith-gill-struck-off-after-claiming-420k-for-backpackers-who-had-left-nz/EO6XACY52JDOTGQOZNYTZHHMMU/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/auckland-gp-judith-gill-struck-off-after-claiming-420k-for-backpackers-who-had-left-nz/EO6XACY52JDOTGQOZNYTZHHMMU/ Shannon PitmanThe doctor received funding for 2618 ineligible patients, most of whom were backpackers. Thu, 14 Dec 2023 22:09:04 +0000 Auckland GP Dr Judith Gill has been struck off for fraudulently claiming public health funding totalling more than $420,000 for patients who were ineligible because they were overseas travellers who'd gone home.
